forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 57 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a cloak of cloudiness, shadows drifting like whispers through the urban architecture. The air carries a distinct chill, settling into the afternoon and coaxing the temperature down to a cool embrace. Rain is forecasted, hinting at an intermission of gentle drops that may soon dance on the pavement. An intermittent fog lingers, its presence subtle but evident, hinting at a marine layer drawn from the bay's depths, draping over the Golden Gate and softening the outlines of the distant hills. 

As evening approaches, the chance of rain escalates, promising a steady fall that will add a glisten to the streets and an introspective mood to the city. It’s a time to gather beneath the eaves of cozy cafés, observing the world through the window, perhaps with a warm cup in hand. A light jacket, perhaps layered over a sweater, would be most appropriate for this damp chill, leaving one free to explore the luminous glow of the cityscape or indulge in the comfort of a spirited gathering indoors. Whether one finds solace in the bustling urbanity or seeks a quiet retreat, this weather lends an intimate charm, perfect for savoring the fleeting moments of a grey winter day.
